entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Carman 5:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -19.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -25.6°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
